text: Na'ankure noti kaziga mopafima nemaniza hankavenentake vahetamina Nagra zamazeri otisuge'za, magopi eme eri tru hute'za avazuhumpi hu'za Babiloni vahera ha' eme huzmante'za, hara huzamagateregahaze. Hagi ana ha' vahe'mo'za atima ahe'arera knare hu'naza vaheki'za mago'zama ahazana hantga nosaza vahe mani'nazankiza, Babiloni vahera ha' eme huzmagatere'za zamavare'za kina ome huzmantegahaze.
